ray.rage.scene.controllers

Class TranslationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.scene.controllers.AbstractController
      • ray.rage.scene.controllers.TranslationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Periodic, Throttleable, Node.Controller

    public class TranslationController
extends AbstractController
implements Throttleable, Periodic
    A Node.Controller implementation that translates controlled nodes.

    The translation process alternates based on a time limit, called the cycle, at which point, the "direction" of the translation process is reverted. For example, an object being translated in one direction will be translated in the opposite direction when the cycle time limit is reached.

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

    • Constructor Detail

      • TranslationController

        public TranslationController(Vector3 axis,
                             float translationSpeed,
                             float periodLengthMillis)
        Creates a new TranslationController along the specified axis, speed, and cycle time.
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis along which translation takes place.
        translationSpeed - The speed of movement.
        periodLengthMillis - Time limit, in milliseconds, before reverting the movement direction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the axis is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the cycle time is not positive.

      • TranslationController

        public TranslationController(Vector3 axis,
                             float translationSpeed)
        Creates a new TranslationController along the specified axis and speed.

        This method relies on a default cycle time.

        Parameters:
        axis - The axis along which translation takes place.
        translationSpeed - The speed of movement.
        Throws:

      • notifyDispose

        public void notifyDispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Explicitly releases the internal resources held by this instance, making it unusable afterwards.

        WARNING: This method is meant to be used internally by the framework and not by game clients. Use directly only if you really know what you're doing.

        Specified by:
        notifyDispose in interface Disposable
        Overrides:
